mapper.select: SELECT uid, uname, email, realname, u.lockdoor, permission, permission_level FROM user AS u INNER JOIN personnel AS ps ON ps.lock_door = u.lockdoor and ps.personnel_email=u.email WHERE u.lockdoor = 1 AND u.email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u.upwd = #{upwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT u.uname, u.permission, pe.permission_insert, pe.permission_delete, pe.permission_update, pe.permission_select, pe.permission_code, pe.permission_operate_table_num FROM promgsys.user AS u INNER JOIN permission AS pe ON pe.permission_code = u.permission WHERE u.lockdoor = 1 AND u.email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u.upwd = #{upwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT permission_insert, permission_delete, permission_update, permission_select, permission_operate_table_num, t.t_name, t.t_name_chinese FROM promgsys.user AS u INNER JOIN permission AS pe ON pe.permission_code = u.permission INNER JOIN pointlisting AS t ON pe.permission_operate_table_num = t.tid WHERE u.lockdoor = 1 AND u.email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT U.permission, PE.pid, PE.personnel_name, PE.personnel_email, PE.personnel_head_portrait, PEM.permission_insert, PEM.permission_delete, PEM.permission_update, PEM.permission_select, PO.t_name,PO.t_name_chinese,PO.tid FROM promgsys.user AS U INNER JOIN personnel AS PE ON PE.pid = U.uid INNER JOIN permission AS PEM ON PEM.permission_code=U.permission INNER JOIN pointlisting AS PO ON PO.tid=PEM.permission_operate_table_num WHERE U.lockdoor=1
SELECT U.permission, PE.pid, PE.personnel_name, PE.personnel_email, PE.personnel_head_portrait FROM promgsys.user AS U INNER JOIN personnel AS PE ON PE.pid = U.uid WHERE U.lockdoor=1
